meanings.definition: A wide sash worn at the waist, especially as part of a man's formal evening dress.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his cummerbunds to the elegant ball.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman adjusted his cummerbunds before entering the gala.
meanings.sent3: The cummerbunds seemed to have a mind of their own, refusing to stay in place.
meanings.sent4: His cummerbunds were like a regal ribbon wrapping around his waist.
meanings.sent5: The cummerbunds shimmered under the chandeliers, adding a touch of sophistication.
